document.discussion_title: Person who appointed Salman should be questioned: Renuka Chaudhary
document.topic_text: Comment Congress leader Renuka Chaudhary speaking to TIMES NOW on the controversy over Salman Khan's appointment as goodwill ambassador for Indian contingent for rio Olympics, and mixed reactions over his appointment, said the visionary who thought of this appointment should be questioned. Chaudhary said Salman has nothing to do with this and he should not be dragged into the controversy. At the same time, she said there are enough sports stars who could have taken Salman's position.
document.post: Comment Congress leader Renuka Chaudhary speaking to TIMES NOW on the controversy over Salman Khan's appointment as goodwill ambassador for Indian contingent for rio Olympics, and mixed reactions over his appointment, said the visionary who thought of this appointment should be questioned.
